channel.title: What's a good VPS?
channel.description: Ok I made a bet with my brother last night that if he didn't get the 4th prestige even though he was at 3rd 49 by 2:30 ( He had 1 hr and a half to do it. ) Anyway the bet was that if I won he had to buy me a VPS and if he won i had to give him $20.00. I wanted to know what was the cheapest and best VPS.

item.title: What's a good VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Web_developer Web developer
item.description:
@Web_developer wrote:

Yeah, I think VPS land is quite decent.

Read full topic

item.title: What's a good VPS?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:3, topic:403417”]NO VPSLAND NO VPSLAND NO VPSLAND lol i was with them for two years, service sucks ass and it is just bad, very much cheaper use www.dewlance.com, i wouldnt get the first one.

when buying it make sure you in the comment you say you need all firewalls, virus protection off and not blocking the ports, and explain to him why. he pretty much is running it by himself but its very affordable ive been using it for a month now with no problems at all[/quote]

Nice company, Cheap prices :D. You sure its good service and 99,99% uptime? Then i buy mines there!

Read full topic

item.title: What's a good VPS?
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

NO VPSLAND NO VPSLAND NO VPSLAND lol i was with them for two years, service sucks ass and it is just bad, very much cheaper use www.dewlance.com, i wouldnt get the first one.

when buying it make sure you in the comment you say you need all firewalls, virus protection off and not blocking the ports, and explain to him why. he pretty much is running it by himself but its very affordable ive been using it for a month now with no problems at all

Read full topic

item.title: What's a good VPS?

item.description:
@minikiller wrote:

Found a decent site for you, but there are probably cheaper ones.
